mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.fudaojiaoshi_name as fudaojiaoshiName ,a.fudaojiaoshi_photo as fudaojiaoshiPhoto ,a.fudaojiaoshi_phone as fudaojiaoshiPhone ,a.fudaojiaoshi_email as fudaojiaoshiEmail ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM fudaojiaoshi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.fudaojiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.fudaojiaoshiName},'%')
and a.fudaojiaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.fudaojiaoshiPhone},'%')
and a.fudaojiaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.fudaojiaoshiEmail},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
